body.p: Simal is a community project, our governance model is similar to that found within Apache Software Foundation projects.Decisions about the future of the project are made through discussion with all members of the community, from the newest user to the most experienced developer. Usually, gaining consensus within the community is easy since all community members have a common set of interests. However, when consensus cannot be easily gained through discussion there are voting procedures in place, binding votes are awarded to those who demonstrate an understanding of the projects objectives and governance model.
